name: DOCS_RCVD_HM_INFO
description: This table stores discrete Health Maintenance information received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: HM_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the name of the Health Maintenance topic.

columns.name: HM_DUE_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the due date of the Health Maintenance topic.

columns.name: HM_SRC_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the Contact Serial Number (CSN) of the source external document record that owns the instance of this Health Maintenance topic.

columns.name: HM_LAST_COMP_DT
columns.description: This item stores the last completion date of the Health Maintenance topic.

columns.name: HM_REFERENCE_IDENT
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference identifier associated with the Health Maintenance topic.

columns.name: HM_COMMENT
columns.description: This item stores the comment of the Health Maintenance topic.

columns.name: HM_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the internal Health Maintenance topic that was mapped to the received info.

columns.name: HM_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the health maintenance topic.
